#Blockchain protects #Identity and #Privacy  because #Users own and #control the #data they share through private and public keys, thanks to Blockchain's encryption, immutability (protocol set in stone), transparency and transaction verification capabilities (chain of signatures and block verification). Users (whether Companies, Institutions or Individuals), by leveraging on the encryption and hashing capabilities of the Blockchain, can therefore #secure and #protect data publicly shared (for example on social media etc.).
